c74object.name: cs.2click-outputs
c74object.description: Load in a bpatcher to use a simple GUI to route audio between other cs.2click modules.

objarg.name: module-name
objarg.description: Unique identifying name for this instance of the module.

objarg.name: slot-number
objarg.description: Number of slots and outlets. Defaults to minimum 1. Maximum is 8.

example.caption: An outputs module sends the audio that comes in its inlets.

c74object.discussion: This abstraction must be loaded within a bpatcher and given a unique symbol as its first argument. This symbol will be used to identify the module in the routing system.
